## Problem 1: Fuzz Bizz
```{r}
i <- 1
df <- data.frame()
while (i<=1000)  {
  if ((i%%5==0) & (i%%3==0)) {
    df <- rbind(df,c("Fuzzbizz"))
  } else if (i%%5==0){
    df <- rbind(df,c("Bizz"))
  } else if (i%%3==0) {
    df <- rbind(df,c("Fuzz"))
  } else {
    df <- rbind(df,c(i))
  }
  i <- i+1
}
print(df)


```

###OPTION 2,  time column 
B <- 10^4
set.seed(1982)

Ut <- runif(B)

Xtibble<- tibble( spaceX=0, spaceY=0, spaceZ=0, time=0:B)

tresholds<-c(1/6,2/6,3/6,4/6,5/6,6/6)

ft<-function(u, a){
  { if(u<=a[1]){
    direction<- c(1,0,0)}else if(u>a[1]&& u<=a[2]) {
      direction<-c(-1,0,0)}else if (u>a[2]&& u<=a[3] ){
        direction<- c(0,1,0)}else if (u>a[3]&& u<=a[4] ){
          direction<- c(0,-1,0)}else if (u>a[4]&& u<=a[5] ){
            direction<- c(0,0,1)}else{
              direction<-c(0,0,-1)} }
  
  return(direction)
}

for(i in 1:B+1){ 
  for(j in 1:3){
  Xtibble[i,j]=Xtibble[i-1,j]+ft(Ut[i-1],tresholds)[j]}
}

print(Xtibble[Xtibble$time==B, ])
